hql: select count(*) from QueryStatement queryStatement
from QueryStatement queryStatement order by keyString
select count(*) from SystemAttribute systemAttribute where upAttribute is null
from SystemAttribute systemAttribute where upAttribute is null
select count(*) from SystemUser systemUser
from SystemUser systemUser
select count(*) from SystemMenu systemMenu where upMenuItem is null
from SystemMenu systemMenu where upMenuItem is null
select count(*) from SystemLog systemLog
from SystemLog systemLog
from Teacher teacher
from Student student order by personTitle, supervisor, gradeName,  major, code
from Major major order by name
select count(*) from Teacher teacher
select count(*) from Student student
select count(*) from Major major
select count(*) from ThingType thingType where upType is null
select count(*) from PersonTitle personTitle where upTitle is null
from Project project order by name
select count(*) from Project project
from Course course order by name
select count(*) from Course course
select count(*) from ThingTypeCircle thingTypeCircle
from ThingTypeCircle thingTypeCircle order by thingType
from Thing thing where thing.thingType in :thingTypeList
select count(*) from Thing thing where thing.thingType in :thingTypeList
select count(*) from QueryStatement queryStatement where queryStatement.hql is null
from QueryStatement queryStatement where queryStatement.hql is null  order by keyString
from Team team where team.thing=:currentThing
select count(*) from Team team where team.thing=:currentThing
from Team team where team.leader=:myself
select count(*) from Team team where team.leader=:myself
select team_members_id  from team_person where person_id=:myself
select count(*) from team_person where person_id=:myself
from Progress progress where progress.team=:currentTeam order by progress.regDate desc
select count(*) from Progress progress where progress.team=:currentTeam
from Evaluate evaluate where evaluate.progress=:currentProgress
select count(*) from Evaluate evaluate where evaluate.progress=:currentProgress
SELECT Count(DISTINCT person.grade_name) FROM person WHERE person.grade_name IS NOT NULL
SELECT DISTINCT person.grade_name FROM person WHERE person.grade_name IS NOT NULL limit %d,%d
from Team team where team.thing in :thingTypeList order by team.thing
select count(*) from Team team where team.thing in :thingTypeList
select count(*) from QueryStatement queryStatement where queryStatement.keyString like :keyString
from QueryStatement queryStatement where queryStatement.keyString like :keyString
from Plan plan  where plan.thingOrTypeId=:thingOrTypeId
